original_title: Kopf Faust Fahne – Perspektiven auf das Thälmanndenkmal
overview: For technical reasons – too massive! – this 50-ton bronze colossus was not demolished in 1993. Today it is listed as a historical monument, along with the associated housing estate. A relic from the old days: Today, the raised fist of the former German Communist Party leader and erstwhile GDR hero Ernst Thälmann in the Prenzlauer Berg park defies the collective forgetting of a not-so-long-ago past instead of heralding the victory of communism.
title: Kopf Faust Fahne – Perspektiven auf das Thälmanndenkmal
